name: ENDOBIOS, Unipessoal Lda
goal:
ENDOBIOS biotech has a dual specialty expertise: the disruptive discovery and development of new bioactive natural products from microorganisms (bacteria, fungi), and the first-time biotechnological application of endobacterial symbionts in the eukaryotic cytoplasm.

Besides our service-providing network, ENDOBIOS also provides specialty consulting in new natural products discovery and development (for Pharma, Agro or Cosmetic application), and in endosymbiotic bacteria living in eukaryotic hosts.

Our currently most advanced project is the mid-preclinical trial development of a drug candidate (isolated from a marine fungus) which is active against central nervous system disorders, particularly epilepsy.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Environment, Public Health, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: None; we only aim to register as an R&D organization providing expert reviewing.
